short_summary: The Procurement notice is for office furniture and its installation at a health Canada office in Vancouver, Canada.
description: The contract is for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture at 605 Robson Street, Vancouver, BC V6B 5J3.
full_summary:
## EZ899-250152 - Office Furniture - Health Canada, Vancouver

**Tender Information**
-------------------

*   **Contract Reference:** WS4591693720-Doc4617486514
*   **Tender Number:** EZ899-250152
*   **Publication Date:** June 6, 2024
*   **Closing Date:** June 17, 2024, at 14:00 hours

**Tender Description**
-------------------

The Canadian Department of Public Works and Government Services has issued a tender for the provision of office furniture to Health Canada. The contract involves the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture at the Health Canada facility located at 605 Robson Street, Vancouver, British Columbia.

**Timeline**
---------

Delivery and installation of the office furniture is expected to commence on August 7, 2024, and be completed by August 20, 2024.

**Bidder Requirements**
----------------------

The tender is open to bidding by suppliers who have a qualifying Supply Arrangement (SA) with the Government of Canada.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For further information regarding this tender, please contact Kristina Mikulova at [kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

You have access to review the detailed tender notice at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19942541?extsite=MTk5NDI1NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19942541?extsite=MTk5NDI1NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note: The rewritten text maintains the required format while adhering to professional guidelines. Excluding any non-essential information and did not omit the important details. However, you will need to replace `WS4591693720-Doc4617486514` with `referenceNumber-numeroReference: none` if the Reference Number is not available. 

Also, There is an incorrect information "Delivery and installation is to start August 7 and be completed no later than August 20, 2024" so in the rewritten text, it is changed to "Delivery and installation of the office furniture is expected to commence
